cssutils
 
[hide private]
[frames] | no frames]
[ Module Hierarchy | Class Hierarchy ]

Class Hierarchy

  • codecs.Codec: Defines the interface for stateless encoders/decoders.
    • codecs.StreamReader
      • cssutils.codec.StreamReader
    • codecs.StreamWriter
      • cssutils.codec.StreamWriter
  • markupbase.ParserBase: Parser base class which provides some common support methods used by the SGML/HTML and XHTML parsers.
    • HTMLParser.HTMLParser: Find tags and other markup and call handler functions.
      • cssutils.script.CSSCaptureHTMLParser: CSSCapture helper: Parse given data for link and style elements
  • object: The most base type
    • cssutils.util.Base: Base class for most CSS and StyleSheets classes
      • cssutils.util.Base2: Base class for new seq handling, used by Selector for now only
        • cssutils.css.cssrule.CSSRule: Abstract base interface for any type of CSS statement.
          • cssutils.css.csscharsetrule.CSSCharsetRule: The CSSCharsetRule interface represents an @charset rule in a CSS style sheet.
          • cssutils.css.csscomment.CSSComment: (cssutils) a CSS comment
          • cssutils.css.cssfontfacerule.CSSFontFaceRule: The CSSFontFaceRule interface represents a @font-face rule in a CSS style sheet.
          • cssutils.css.cssimportrule.CSSImportRule: Represents an @import rule within a CSS style sheet.
          • cssutils.css.cssmediarule.CSSMediaRule: Objects implementing the CSSMediaRule interface can be identified by the MEDIA_RULE constant.
          • cssutils.css.cssnamespacerule.CSSNamespaceRule: Represents an @namespace rule within a CSS style sheet.
          • cssutils.css.csspagerule.CSSPageRule: The CSSPageRule interface represents a @page rule within a CSS style sheet.
          • cssutils.css.cssstylerule.CSSStyleRule: The CSSStyleRule object represents a ruleset specified (if any) in a CSS style sheet.
          • cssutils.css.cssunknownrule.CSSUnknownRule: represents an at-rule not supported by this user agent.
        • cssutils.css.cssstyledeclaration.CSSStyleDeclaration: The CSSStyleDeclaration class represents a single CSS declaration block.
        • cssutils.css.selector.Selector: (cssutils) a single selector in a SelectorList of a CSSStyleRule
        • cssutils.stylesheets.stylesheet.StyleSheet: The StyleSheet interface is the abstract base interface for any type of style sheet.
          • cssutils.css.cssstylesheet.CSSStyleSheet: The CSSStyleSheet interface represents a CSS style sheet.
      • cssutils.css.cssvalue.CSSValue: The CSSValue interface represents a simple or a complex value.
        • cssutils.css.cssvalue.CSSPrimitiveValue: represents a single CSS Value.
        • cssutils.css.cssvalue.CSSValueList: The CSSValueList interface provides the abstraction of an ordered collection of CSS values.
      • cssutils.stylesheets.medialist.MediaList: Provides the abstraction of an ordered collection of media, without defining or constraining how this collection is implemented.
      • cssutils.stylesheets.mediaquery.MediaQuery: A Media Query consists of a media type and one or more expressions involving media features.
      • cssutils.css.property.Property: (cssutils) a CSS property in a StyleDeclaration of a CSSStyleRule
      • cssutils.css.selectorlist.SelectorList: (cssutils) a list of Selectors of a CSSStyleRule
    • cssutils.css.cssproperties.CSS2Properties: The CSS2Properties interface represents a convenience mechanism for retrieving and setting properties within a CSSStyleDeclaration.
      • cssutils.css.cssstyledeclaration.CSSStyleDeclaration: The CSSStyleDeclaration class represents a single CSS declaration block.
    • cssutils.script.CSSCapture: Retrieve all CSS stylesheets including embedded for a given URL.
    • cssutils.parse'.CSSParser: parses a CSS StyleSheet string or file and returns a DOM Level 2 CSS StyleSheet object
    • cssutils.css2productions.CSSProductions
    • cssutils.css3productions.CSSProductions: has attributes for all PRODUCTIONS
    • cssutils.cssproductions.CSSProductions: most attributes are set later
    • cssutils.serialize.CSSSerializer: Methods to serialize a CSSStylesheet and its parts
    • cssutils.DOMImplementationCSS: This interface allows the DOM user to create a CSSStyleSheet outside the context of a document.
    • cssutils.helper.Deprecated: This is a decorator which can be used to mark functions as deprecated.
    • codecs.IncrementalDecoder: An IncrementalDecoder decodes an input in multiple steps.
      • cssutils.codec.IncrementalDecoder
    • codecs.IncrementalEncoder: An IncrementalEncoder encodes an input in multiple steps.
      • cssutils.codec.IncrementalEncoder
    • cssutils.util.Item: an item in the seq list of classes (successor to tuple items in old seq)
    • cssutils.util.ListSeq: (EXPERIMENTAL) A base class used for list classes like css.SelectorList or stylesheets.MediaList
      • cssutils.stylesheets.medialist.MediaList: Provides the abstraction of an ordered collection of media, without defining or constraining how this collection is implemented.
      • cssutils.css.selectorlist.SelectorList: (cssutils) a list of Selectors of a CSSStyleRule
    • cssutils.serialize.Out: a simple class which makes appended items available as a combined string
    • cssutils.serialize.Preferences: controls output of CSSSerializer
    • cssutils.util.Seq: property seq of Base2 inheriting classes, holds a list of Item objects.
    • cssutils.tokenize2.Tokenizer: (Tokenname, value, startline, startcolumn)
    • cssutils.errorhandler._ErrorHandler: handles all errors and log messages
      • cssutils.errorhandler.ErrorHandler: Singleton, see _ErrorHandler
    • cssutils.util._Namespaces: A dictionary like wrapper for @namespace rules used in a CSSStyleSheet.
      • cssutils.util._SimpleNamespaces: namespaces used in objects like Selector as long as they are not connected to a CSSStyleSheet
    • list: list() -> new list list(sequence) -> new list initialized from sequence's items
      • cssutils.css.cssrulelist.CSSRuleList: The CSSRuleList object represents an (ordered) list of statements.
      • cssutils.stylesheets.stylesheetlist.StyleSheetList: Interface StyleSheetList (introduced in DOM Level 2)

cssutils
